statement.ebname: The impact of modern code reviews on product quality

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the impact of code reviews on defect detection or repair.

statement.ebname: The impact of modern code reviews on product quality

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the impact of code reviews on code quality.

statement.ebname: The impact of modern code reviews on product quality

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the impact of code reviews on detection or fixes of security issues.

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the impact of code reviews on software design.

statement.ebname: The impact of modern code reviews on human aspects

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the impact of code reviews on teams' understanding of the code under review.

statement.ebname: The impact of modern code reviews on human aspects

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the impact of code reviews on peer impression in terms of trust, reliability, perception of expertise, and friendship.

statement.ebname: The impact of modern code reviews on human aspects

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the impact of code reviews on developers' attitude and motivation to contribute.

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the impact of code size changes on the code review process.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews process properties

statements.statement: It is important to investigate when code reviews should be performed.

statements.statement: It is important to investigate what the code review benefits are, besides finding defects.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews process properties

statements.statement: It is important to investigate how review requests are distributed (unicast, e.g. Jira, vs. broadcast, e.g. a mailing list).

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the efficiency and effectiveness of code reviews compared to team walkthroughs.

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the impact of mentioning peers in code review comments.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews process properties

statements.statement: It is important to investigate reviews of test code.

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the decision making process in the code review process.

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the difference between pre and post-commit code reviews.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews process properties

statements.statement: It is important to investigate strategies for merging pull requests.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews process properties

statements.statement: It is important to investigate motivations, challenges and best practices of the code review process.

statements.statement: It is important to investigate review performance and reviewers’ reviewing patterns and focus.

statement.ebname: Modern code review performance and human factors

statements.statement: It is important to investigate review performance and reviewers’ perception of code and review quality.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews and organizational factors

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the difference between core and irregular reviewers in terms of the review requests amount, frequency and speed.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews and organizational factors

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the difference between core and irregular reviewers in terms of the likelihood of change request acceptance.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews and organizational factors

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the difference between core and irregular reviewers in terms of the level of agreement between reviewers.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews and organizational factors

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the difference between core and irregular reviewers in terms of career paths.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews and organizational factors

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the effect of number of involved reviewers on code reviews.

statement.ebname: Modern code reviews and organizational factors

statements.statement: It is important to investigate the information needs of reviewers in code reviews.

statement.ebname: Support systems for modern code reviews 1

statements.statement: It is important to investigate support for analyzing the sentiment/attitude/intention in code reviews.

statement.ebname: Support systems for modern code reviews 1

statements.statement: It is important to investigate support for determining the usefulness of code reviews.

statement.ebname: Support systems for modern code reviews 1

statements.statement: It is important to investigate support for monitoring review performance and quality.

statement.ebname: Support systems for modern code reviews 1

statements.statement: It is important to investigate support for optimizing the order of code reviews.

statement.ebname: ﻿Support systems for modern code reviews 2

statements.statement: It is important to investigate support for understanding the code changes that need to be reviewed.

statements.statement: It is important to investigate support for managing code reviews.

statement.ebname: ﻿Support systems for modern code reviews 3

statements.statement: It is important to investigate support for selection of appropriate code reviewers.

statements.statement: It is important to investigate support for code reviews on touch-enabled devices.

statement.ebname: ﻿Support systems for modern code reviews 3

statements.statement: It is important to investigate support for automating code reviews.
